name: About Me
desc2: Born in Mexico City, I moved between my birth city, Tokyo, and my hometown San Antonio in my youth
I love cooking, exercise, video games, and keeping up with the news
I'm always coming up with new ideas. My mind always wanders into the 'how can this be better?' realm frequently
img3d: My husband Josue is one of my biggest supporters <3

name: Education
desc2: I graduated from NYU in 2017 with a major in Music and minor in Game Design
Courses ranged from understanding the physics of sound, electronic music, and programming for games
In 2022 I completed the Flatiron School's Software Engineering Bootcamp
Focusing on Full Stack Development with Ruby On Rails and React.js + Redux
I created several projects, some are featured below!
img1d: I spent my first year of undergrand in Italy, Ciao!
img2d: Where I took my favorite courses at NYU

name: Xian Famous Foods
desc: Worked as a Store Associate from 2018-2019
desc2: I worked my way up from the bottom starting as a cashier until I was a level below my manager
I interfaced with customers, prepared noodles, salads, and 'burgers' within 10 minutes
I trained several fellow employees in customer interfacing, line work, inventory ordering, and maintaing store hygiene
img1d: I became an expert at hand pulling bian-biang noodles
img3Desc: How it felt like working @ XFF
img3d: Very tough but also very rewarding work!

name: Pure Sweets & Co.
desc2: My thoughtfulness and attention to detail really shined working at this Vegan and Gluten Free Establishment
I produced the majority of pastry items and even was cross trained to cake decorate as well as work the line.
Between September of 2020 and May of 2022, I consistently contributed towards 50% of sales
I have develop several new recipes as well as reimagine existing recipes to improve quality, customer satisfaction, and production costs
img1d: One of the cakes I'm most proud of
img2d: Blessed to be given a lot of creative liberty
img3d: Another of my signature flavor combinations
